task: Accept a new delivery request.
Navigate to the restaurant for food pickup.
Confirm the pickup of the food items from the restaurant.
Notify the customer about the estimated delivery time.
Navigate to the customer's location for food delivery.
Confirm the successful delivery of the food items to the customer.
Handle and report any issues with the order (e.g., missing items, delays).
Record and submit daily earnings for review.
Monitor fuel level and find the nearest gas station if needed.
Update availability status (e.g., going offline, taking a break).
Rate the restaurant based on the ease of the pickup process.
Rate the customer based on the ease of the delivery process.
Review customer feedback and ratings.
Contact support for resolving any disputes or issues.
Submit receipts for any work-related expenses for reimbursement.
View and accept any promotional tasks or bonus opportunities.
Check and maintain vehicle condition (e.g., tire pressure, oil level).
Keep track of miles driven for tax purposes.
Receive and confirm batched orders (multiple pickups or deliveries).
Track and report any tips received.
